DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial see safe combination naproxen sodium 440 mg diphenhydramine hydrochloride ( DPH ) 50 mg ( investigational product ) compare placebo ( capsule contain drug ) take 10 day .
DOC.criteria: Healthy , ambulatory , male female volunteer age 12 old History experience occasional sleeplessness accompany ache pain least two time , continually 14 day per month , least 2 past 3 month Female subject childbearing potential must use medically acceptable form birth control , e.g. , oral patch contraceptive , intrauterine device , DepoProveraÂ® , least 1 month prior screen ( 3 month oral contraceptive ) , doublebarrier negative pregnancy test Screening . Female subject nonchildbearing potential must amenorrheic least 2 year hysterectomy and/or bilateral oophorectomy Be willing able participate schedule visit , treatment plan , test trial procedure accord protocol Provide personally sign date informed consent indicate subject inform pertinent aspect trial , ( subject < 18 year age must sign write assent parental guardian consent ) . History hypersensitivity naproxen sodium , acetaminophen , NSAIDs ( Nonsteroidal Antiinflammatory Drugs ) , diphenhydramine antihistamine , similar pharmacological agent component product Evidence history clinically significant ( judgment investigator ) hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic disease , malignancy last 5 year A history chronic severe sleep problem respond OTC ( Overthecounter ) medication and/or require prescription hypnotic sedative Currently experience chronic pain chronic NSAID therapy ( defined take daily [ 5 7 day per week ] regimen prescription OTC NSAIDs ) Current past history gastrointestinal ulcer bleed bleed disorder Use OTC prescription medication administration naproxen , acetaminophen , NSAIDs , diphenhydramine antihistamine sedative , contraindicate Chronic use product contain diphenhydramine , include topical product Use steroid blood thinning ( anticoagulant ) drug ( aspirin 81 mg permit dose take least one month prior screen )
